722874f-c.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 75th Street
722874f-c.text:
RIvERSIDE PAEE:
(1)
Riverside Drive, north from but not including 77th Street.
Jaly 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, as No. 1, further southward.
July 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, a different angle, The New York Central Railroad
Tracks are in the foreground.
July 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

722872f-b.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 75th Street
722872f-b.text:
EIVERSIDE PARE:
(1)
Riverside Drive, north from but not including 75th Street,
showing reconstruotion work in progress on the west side of the
"Drive."
-August 29, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, two years later.
June 11, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, as No. 2 from a different angle.
June 11, 1934.
eP. L. Sperr.
